mapper.insert: insert into t_wechat_user(openid,nickname,country,province,city,language,sex,headimgurl) values (#{openid},#{nickname},#{country},#{province},#{city},#{language},#{sex},#{headimgurl}) on duplicate key update nickname=#{nickname},country=#{country},province=#{province},city=#{city},language=#{language},sex=#{sex},headimgurl=#{headimgurl};
